description: Data analysis performed by this work element will be coordinated by NPT with co-managers from IDFG, ODFW, and WDFW.  Completion of this work will produce abundance estimates of Snake River Basin Sp/Su Chinook salmon at each population and collaboratively approved sub-population IPTDS site, and a summary of abundances into ICTRT populations by sex and age categories.
